summary: ENGINE SHUT OFF  ON 7/7/2017  APPOX 2:40 PST  THE VEHICLE WAS STOPPED AT A STOP LIGHT ON A BUSY SURFACE STREET WHEN THE LIGHT TURNED GREEN I PRESSED THE GAS TO MOVE THROUGH THE LIGHT AND THERE WAS NO POWER COMING FROM THE ENGINE.  I WAS ABLE TO PULL OVER, PUT THE CAR IN PARK AND TURN THE ENGINE OFF.  I PUSH BUTTON STARTED THE ENGINE AND THE CAR OPERATED AS NORMAL.    ON 7/8/2017 APPROX 1:30 PST I WAS COMPLETING A LEFT HAND TURN WHEN THE VEHICLE STALLED WITH NO POWER COMING FROM THE ENGINE. I PUT MY FLASHERS ON, PUT THE CAR IN PARK, TURNED OFF THE ENGINE. WITHIN SECONDS I PUSH BUTTON STARTED THE VEHICLE AND IT STARTED UP NORMALLY.
